header_text: One afternoon you are hanging out with a friend, and you notice that the conversation has died down. Neither of you says anything for a while, and your friend can sense that you feel uncomfortable.

elements.Text: Does your friend think you are okay with silence?

elements.name: One afternoon you are hanging out with a friend, and you notice that the conversation has died down. Neither of you says anything for a while, and your friend can sense that you feel uncomfortable._Social Situations_comp_question
